body.name: Mochic 13oz Portable Water Flask Flat Water Bottle for Purse Mug BPA Free A5 Slim Square Water Bottle White Flask Leak Proof Plastic Flask Bottle for Travel
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.

features: 1- Slim, Discreet, Space-Saving: Your new thirst-wrenching travel companion is here, as this slim water bottle for purses will fit any bag, backpack, or even a pocket; Our rectangular water bottle for handbags will not only ideally travel and discreetly suit small spaces, but this versatile travel flask is the only flat bottle of water you will ever need

2- Anti-Leak Silicone Seal: Our portable water bottle comes armed with a firm and secure silicone seal to protect liquids from escaping, making this purse water bottle ideal for storing in all positions; Protected with a screw cap lid, this leak proof travel water bottle is ideal as a handbag water bottle for commute, camping flask, or a trendy water bottle for work

3- Durable Clear Tritan Plastic: This cute white water bottle does not compromise superior durability and is expertly made of a transparent Tritan plastic material for ultimate robustness; Great for fast content recognition while sides-covered with a slip-free grip soft TPU material, this cool water bottle will handle a knock or drop when on the move

4- Safe Hold On-a-Go Strap: The advantages of this small water bottle for purses go beyond practicality as it comes with a carrying strap to ensure ultimate safety while on a go; Secure to hold or attach anywhere, our cute clear water bottle with strap makes the best travel accessory as your daily hydrating companion, unlike other purse flask around

5- Versatile for Your Daily Needs: Not just your average clear flask, but a multitasking flat water bottle for travels and beyond, our A5 water bottle has no limits; Ideal as a camping water bottle, compact water bottle for backpack side pocket, bag water bottle for school trips, or a pretty water bottle for gym - endlessly practical, our white clear water bottle has it all
body.description: With a 13oz/380mL capacity, this small travel water bottle is your next ultimate hydrating companion. Lightweight, leak-proof, and easy to carry everywhere while featuring super-sleek lines to make a head-turning statement, our travel size water bottle makes a thoughtful gift or a treat to yourself. Designed to be admired while built to fit into a modern lifestyle with endlessly practical features, this flat water flask has an ever-trendy, eye-catching pink color to reflect and inspire your individuality and style. Compact in size yet big on practicality, this unique water bottle will soon become your best travel friend. Perfect as a gym water bottle, water bottle for camping, school water bottle, or office water bottle - so, go crazy and enjoy our thin water bottle for purses and totes wherever you need a thirst-quenching sip. Good for thirst, while excellent for the environment, our reusable water bottles contribute to a greener Earth. Reliable as a long-term solution for protecting our planet, these refillable rectangle water bottles offer an alternative to disposable single-use drinking bottles with durability and craftsmanship to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this travel water bottle. It’s very sleek and fits nicely into your purse. No spillage or leakage at all, even when you’re tossing your bag around.You may get some looks because it does look like a flask! But it’s my favorite thing in my purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for backpack
reviews.reviewText: This item fits so in my backpack so much better than a round water bottle . Cute too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about it! It doesn’t take up too much room in my bag and is lightweight! Easily cleaned and very attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really like this bottle, leak proof, easy to bring everywhere!My only issue so far, where can I buy a new "On the go Hand Strap"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got it for my purse, keeping it forever
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I wanted a little bottle for my purse since I found that I tended to leave larger bottles at home so I didn't have to carry them around. I was a little worried it would leak but I've thrown my purse around, left it places, absolutely no care or thought put into what was happening inside my purse and I have found not a single drop! It carries enough water to get me through until I can refill it and it's cute as hecccck. I get a compliment nearly every time I pull it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite purse water bottle
reviews.reviewText: Everyone always asks me why I have a flask in my purse whenever they see me with this thing.It works very well and fits nicely in my purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way too small
reviews.reviewText: It is very pretty and I get complements about it but its capacity is less than a water bottle
